text: geunal-eneun namnyeo wiseonjadeul-i mid-eum-eulo chungsilhan jadeul-ege malhalila jamkkanman gidalyeo jusoseo jeohuido gwangmyeong-eul chajgoja habnida gwangmyeong-eul chaj eulago hani dol-agalaneun mal-i deul lideola geuttae geudeul saiga bunlidoe go mun-i hanabakk-e eobsneun byeog-i saeng-gini geu an-e issneun jadeul-egeneun geu an-ui eunhyega iss-eul geos-iyo bakk-e issneun ja-egeneun eungbeol-i iss-eulila
